column1: Q: What if I go over budget?
A: Don't stress. Adjust next month. Budgeting is a skill that improves.
Q: How much should I save?
A: Start with 20% of income. Build 3-6 month emergency fund first.
Q: How do I calculate net worth?
A: Total Assets - Total Liabilities = Net Worth. Update monthly.
Q: What subscriptions should I cancel?
A: Any you haven't used in 30 days. Check Subscription Tracker for recommendations.
